templatewizard-add-all: Label of button that enables all inactive parameters.
templatewizard-cancel:
Text for the cancel button that closes the dialogue window.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
templatewizard-close-dialog: Title for the warning shown when closing the dialog when there are values in a field.
templatewizard-close-dialog-retry: Label for the button with which to discard any values that have been entered and close the TemplateWizard dialog.
templatewizard-default:
Text appended to a parameter field's help text to show the parameter's default value. Parameter $1 is the default value.
{{Identical|Default}}
templatewizard-dismissible-message-close: Tooltip for the close button that closes an info message so it's never shown again.
templatewizard-help: Text for the help link in the dialog footer.
templatewizard-help-title: Tooltip text for the help link.
templatewizard-insert:
Text for the main template-insertion button.
{{Identical|Insert}}
templatewizard-invalid-title: Error message shown when an invalid title is entered in the search field.
templatewizard-invalid-values:
Error message shown when template-insertion button is clicked but there are invalid fields.
Options are to keep editing ({{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-edit}}) or continue anyway ({{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-insert}}).
templatewizard-invalid-values-edit: Text for button with which to return to editing the template form. Other option is {{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-insert}}.
templatewizard-invalid-values-insert: Text for button with which to ignore invalid fields and insert the template as-is. Other options is {{msg-mw|templatewizard-invalid-values-edit}}.
templatewizard-no-description: Information message shown when TemplateData exists but has no description.
templatewizard-no-params-with-td: Information message shown when TemplateData exists and there are no parameters defined in it. Parameter $1 is the URL of the TemplateData help page on MediaWiki.org.
templatewizard-no-params-without-td: Information message shown when there is no TemplateData and no raw parameters could be determined. Parameter $1 is the URL of the TemplateData help page on MediaWiki.org.
templatewizard-no-templatedata: Information message shown when the requested template does not have TemplateData, and the template's raw parameters are shown. Parameter $1 is the URL of the TemplateData help page on MediaWiki.org.
templatewizard-opens-in-new-tab: Tooltip shown for the template name link.
templatewizard-parameters-optional: Fieldset legend for the set of optional template parameters.
templatewizard-parameters-required: Fieldset legend for the set of required template parameters.
templatewizard-parameters-suggested: Fieldset legend for the set of suggested template parameters.
templatewizard-placeholder-default: Form input placeholder text that shows the parameter's default value.
templatewizard-placeholder-example: Form input placeholder text that shows an example of a value for the parameter.
templatewizard-remove-all: Label of button that removes all active and non-required parameter fields.
templatewizard-remove-template: Title of error message displayed when a template is removed when there's still a value in one of its fields.
templatewizard-remove-template-retry: Text for button that closes the remove-template error and closes the template, returning to the search form.
templatewizard-search-placeholder: Placeholder text in the template search field.
templatewizard-search-feedback-message: Text for the feedback message to inform users about template search improvements with a link to the project page.
templatewizard-parambutton-add-title:
Tooltip for the button to add a field into the template editor.

Parameters:
* $1 - Parameter name
templatewizard-parambutton-remove-title:
Tooltip for the button to remove a field from the template editor.

Parameters:
* $1 - Parameter name
templatewizard-parambutton-required-titl:
Tooltip for the title of a required field in the template editor.

Parameters:
* $1 - Parameter name
templatewizard-remove-template-title: Tooltip for the button to discard work on the current template and go back to selecting a new template.
templatewizard-link-to-template-title: Tooltip for the button that opens the template's page in a new window
templatewizard-use:
Text for the template search box selection button.
{{Identical|Use}}
